==Description==
[[Spirit Speak]] is a very useful spells for meta mages but in direct use of the skill, you can only use [[Spirit Speak]] to hear the dead speak. Usually when a ghost attempts speech, all a live character will see is a series of OoOooOo's, the spirit speak skill allows you to clearly read what they intended to say.  For meta mages, it gives mana recovery in PvM.

==Usage==
'''Listening to Others'''
:If you manually activate Spirit Speak and successfully channel your spiritual energy, you will hear what ghosts say instead of OooOOOoOo. 

'''Spirit Speak & Idol of the Magi '''
:When a player has a meta talisman Idol of the Magi AND has GM Spirit Speak, they receive 25% mana recovery from any direct damage spell cast against PvM targets.

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-100: Activate the skill either by macro or skill button.
